name.zh_TW: Glimmer | 你的瀏覽器生產力夥伴

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that supercharges your productivity by providing you with a suite of tools and get things done faster.
short.zh_TW: 一款瀏覽器擴展，通過提供一套工具來提高你的生產力，讓你更快地完成工作。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that supercharges your productivity by providing you with a suite of tools and get things done faster with features like floating quick actions toolbar, tooltip for text highlighting.
